>
[Devilish Wiles](/Feats.aspx?ID=2453) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiefling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=258" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 62 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Traditionally, fiends are exceptionally good at persuading people to do things, even when their targets know it's a bad idea. You're also rather good at it, compelling the weak and weak-willed to your bidding. You can cast [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) once per day as a 1st-level divine innate spell.
